title: still wondering what the "bonus" rewards for hitting gold in both duo and flex queue are.
body:
since were getting closer to the end, just thought i should bring it up that riot promised us a little something extra for ranking gold+ in both queues. 

it does seem like an appropriate time to say what it is so players who haven't heard about the reward or those who are just learning of it have an appropriate amount of time to hit gold+ in either queue before the seasons over.

replies.body: I hope they reward us with getting rid of flex queue
Why? Does flex queue sneak into your room at night and steal your toys?
I desperately want it to be a chroma for the victorious skin. I got gold in all 3 queues (despite being very much a silver player) just in case it was this.
Watch it just be a boarder on the reward skin's loading screen splash.

IMO im predicting a halfsies border, like the left half is your solo rank and the right half is your flex rank, and they'll have different textures for their respective queues. 

although id rather they not touch the load screen boarder at all, id rather have a choice skin unlock or a special ward skin instead.
